beers.notes: Notes of black tea, wildflower honey, white table grapes, and pumpernickel.
beers.description: English Mild. 4.2% Brewed with a plethora of specialty malts. Gently hopped in the kettle with Loral and over 30lbs of Medjool Dates.
beers.summary:
English Mild. 4.2% Brewed with a plethora of specialty malts. Gently hopped in the kettle with Loral and over 30lbs of Medjool Dates.
Notes of black tea, wildflower honey, white table grapes, and pumpernickel.

beers.notes: Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, juicy fruit, and earth.
beers.description: Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #19. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
beers.summary:
Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #19. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, juicy fruit, and earth.

beers.notes: Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.
beers.description: Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
beers.summary:
Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.

beers.notes: Notes of macaroon, frozen cocktail with tiny umbrella, lemongrass, and coral.
beers.description: Coconut White Bier: Brewed with raw wheat and oats. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with Melba, Cascade and Coriander. Fermented with our saison yeast and one of our favorite Brett strains then gently conditioned on a delicate amount of toasted coconut.
beers.summary:
Coconut White Bier: Brewed with raw wheat and oats. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with Melba, Cascade and Coriander. Fermented with our saison yeast and one of our favorite Brett strains then gently conditioned on a delicate amount of toasted coconut.
Notes of macaroon, frozen cocktail with tiny umbrella, lemongrass, and coral.

beers.notes: Notes of fresh passion fruit, sauvignon blanc, juicy watermelon, and black peppercorns.
beers.description: IPA. 6.9% Brewed with red wheat. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with Amarillo and Galaxy then lavishly dry hopped with Nelson Sauvin.
beers.summary:
IPA. 6.9% Brewed with red wheat. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with Amarillo and Galaxy then lavishly dry hopped with Nelson Sauvin.
Notes of fresh passion fruit, sauvignon blanc, juicy watermelon, and black peppercorns.

beers.notes: Notes of Mango punch, sugar coated lemon, rainforest dew drop, and ripe passion fruit.
beers.description: Pink Lemon DIPA. 8.8% Brewed with globs of fluffy oats, locally grown pink lemons and hibiscus. Hopped in the kettle assertively with Citra. Then aggressively dry hopped with Lemondrop and Citra.
beers.summary:
Pink Lemon DIPA. 8.8% Brewed with globs of fluffy oats, locally grown pink lemons and hibiscus. Hopped in the kettle assertively with Citra. Then aggressively dry hopped with Lemondrop and Citra.
Notes of Mango punch, sugar coated lemon, rainforest dew drop, and ripe passion fruit.

beers.notes: Notes of pink lady apples, lively prosecco, petit fours, and orchard breeze.
beers.description: Asian Pear Saison. 6.0% Brewed with jasmine rice. Hopped in the kettle with Melba and black peppercorns, and conditioned on heaps of Asian Pear puree.
beers.summary:
Asian Pear Saison. 6.0% Brewed with jasmine rice. Hopped in the kettle with Melba and black peppercorns, and conditioned on heaps of Asian Pear puree.
Notes of pink lady apples, lively prosecco, petit fours, and orchard breeze.

beers.notes: Notes of maple syrup, caramel brownies, creme brulee, and admiration of the past.
beers.description: Elder Ale 8.5% Brewed with a plethora of specialty malt. Boiled for an extended period of time and ever so gently hopped in the kettle with Loral. Fermented and conditioned in stainless for many moons. Cozy and heart-warming.
beers.summary:
Elder Ale 8.5% Brewed with a plethora of specialty malt. Boiled for an extended period of time and ever so gently hopped in the kettle with Loral. Fermented and conditioned in stainless for many moons. Cozy and heart-warming.
Notes of maple syrup, caramel brownies, creme brulee, and admiration of the past.

beers.notes: Notes of orange marmalade, raw honeycomb, dry riesling, and tundra grass.
beers.description: German IPA 6.1% Brewed entirely with German Pilsner malt. Hopped in the kettle solely with Hallertau Blanc then assertively dry hopped with Hallertau Mittelfruh and more Hallertau Blanc. Was immer du tun oder traumen kannst, beginne es.
beers.summary:
German IPA 6.1% Brewed entirely with German Pilsner malt. Hopped in the kettle solely with Hallertau Blanc then assertively dry hopped with Hallertau Mittelfruh and more Hallertau Blanc. Was immer du tun oder traumen kannst, beginne es.
Notes of orange marmalade, raw honeycomb, dry riesling, and tundra grass.
